net.sf.jboard.model.forum.clients
Class ForumThreadClient

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.jboard.model.forum.clients.ForumBaseClient
      net.sf.jboard.model.forum.clients.ForumThreadClient
public class ForumThreadClient
extends ForumBaseClient

the business client which call the DAO layer to do some forumThread actions. the visibility of this class is reduces to package. the only public class is ForumFacadeClient.

Version:
$Revision: 1.19 $
Author:
$author$
